snippet.title: Black Trail VR | Official Release Trailer
snippet.description:
It's time to explore and survive in the lawless lands of the Old West. Black Trail launches with a 15% discount on its first week! 
Dive right into action: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1576420/Black_Trail_VR/

In Black Trail, players will step into the boots of two distinct characters: a battle-hardened bounty hunter and a vengeful Native American warrior. Their stories interlace across a war-torn landscape, guided by the pursuit of powerful artifacts that could alter the course of history. This game isn't just about survival; it's about rewriting the legacy of the Old West.

Twitter: https://twitter.com/BlackTrailGame
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@blacktrailvr
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/2bQhRTmrYt

Official Website: https://www.blacktrailgame.com/
